/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. The sun is shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the colors of the cityscape.
